title: Response with statistics of the trader

active_since.description: This is the epoch the investor started trading with binary.com

monthly_profitable_trades.description: Represents the net change in equity in the months.

yearly_profitable_trades.description: Represents the net change in equity in the years.

last_12months_profitable_trades.description: Represents the net change in equity for a 12-month period.

total_trades.description: Total number of trades for all time.

trades_profitable.description: Number of profit trades in percentage.

avg_duration.description: Average seconds of keeping positions open.

avg_profit.description: Average profit of trades in percentage.

avg_loss.description: Average loss of trades in percentage.

trades_breakdown.description: Represents the portfolio distribution by the markets.

req_id.description: Optional field send in request to map to response, present only when request contains req_id
